description: Evaluates leadership/skill assessments through multiple cultural lenses to expose hidden norms (e.g., humility vs. self-promotion, collective duty vs. individual ambition). Produces a cross-lens stability score and highlights lens-dependent conclusions.

default_lenses: Australasian Aboriginal custodial stewardship & intergenerational continuity

lens_parameters.visibility_weight: Importance of self-promotion vs. quiet outputs (0–1)
lens_parameters.duty_weight: Emphasis on role obligation over self-advancement (0–1)
lens_parameters.autonomy_preference: Preference for solo execution vs. group process (0–1)

signal_inputs.candidate_profile: Work history, skills, incident logs, peer notes, output metrics.
signal_inputs.assessment_text: Any narrative reviews to be re-scored through cultural lenses.
signal_inputs.task_context: Environment & job demands (e.g., cold, remote, high-variance, safety-critical).
signal_inputs.lens_selection: Subset of lenses to apply; defaults to library.

computations.lens_score: Weighted sum over observed behaviors × lens parameters.
computations.cross_lens_variance: Variance of lens_score across selected lenses.
computations.lens_robust_rank: Ranking of candidates by average lens_score and stability_index
computations.context_fit: Cosine similarity between task_context vector and lens parameter vector.

robust.interpretation: Assessment conclusions hold across cultures; unlikely to be lens-bound.

fragile.interpretation: Conclusions flip by lens; methodology likely culturally biased.

good.interpretation: Chosen lens aligns with job environment.

mismatch.interpretation: Lens not appropriate for the operating context.

context_fit.notes: Why this lens fits (or not) given task context.

blind_spots: Detected norms that drive results (e.g., visibility bias).

recommendations.selection_criteria: Lens-robust, physics-aligned criteria (e.g., fault rate, autonomy under variance).
development_paths: Targeted training aligned to environment (checklists, cold-weather dexterity, etc.)
audit_flags: Promotion paths that require self-promotion contradict humility-weighted lenses.

metadata.author: JinnZ v2
metadata.notes: Lens parameters are exemplar defaults; organizations should calibrate with field data and indigenous knowledge holders.
